div.p: Type your answer here... sales@sporterp.co.uk and we'll get back to you shortly.

div.span: My preferred payment method isn't listed. What should I do?

div.p: We accept all major credit/debit cards and Klarna. If your prefer to pay by some other method please write to us at sales@sporterp.co.uk and we'll get back to you shortly.
